caption.p: Risk of craniosynostosis in SMAD6 mutation carriers in the presence or absence of a BMP2 risk allele.

fn.p: All members of kindreds found to have a mutation in SMAD6 were included. SMAD6(+) indicates the presence of a heterozygous LOF or D-mis allele. The reported BMP2 risk allele is ‘C’ at risk locus rs1884302, found within a gene desert ~345kb downstream of BMP2. p=1.4 × 10−10 by the Freeman-Halton extension of Fisher’s exact test. Odds ratio in favor of disease was incalculable due to the absence of craniosynostosis in SMAD6 (−) individuals in these kindreds.
